message.entry: Input graphs must both be undirected or both be directed.
''{0}'' value must be a string vector, a character vector, or a cell array of character vectors.
Datatype mismatch in node variable {0}, datatype is ''{1}'' in first graph, but ''{2}'' in second graph.
Datatype mismatch in edge variable {0}, datatype is ''{1}'' in first graph, but ''{2}'' in second graph.
No node variable {0} in first graph.
No node variable {0} in second graph.
No edge variable {0} in first graph.
No edge variable {0} in second graph.
Size mismatch in node variable {0}. Node variables in input graphs must have the same size.
Size mismatch in edge variable {0}. Edge variables in input graphs must have the same size.
